title: Chocolat no Mahou
synopsis: Chocolatier Chocolat Aikawa and her enigmatic acquaintance Cacao Theobroma run a shop named Chocolat Noir, which is famous for its specially crafted chocolates, known to miraculously grant wishes. A variety of troubled individuals find themselves in front of the shop, seeking its merchandise, but these chocolates are expensive—each customer must pay with their most precious belonging. Although Chocolat seems to be a lady who would have no problems of her own, due to her ability to grant wishes, beneath her mysterious facade is a distressed young girl who has not settled a score from her past... [Written by MAL Rewrite]
ending_themes: #1: "The Labyrinth ~Chocolat no Mahou~ (The Labyrinth ~ショコラの魔法)" by Rina Isaku (伊作梨南) (eps 3-9)
#2:" Crime and bitter" by Saki Oshitani (押谷沙樹) (eps 10-)
